author: Stephen Alpher
title: Semler Scientific Investors Cheered by New Hire, Lofty Bitcoin Acquisition Goals
description: The company's roughed-up shares are higher by 14% in a down market following the late-Thursday announcements.
content:
Semler Scientific (SMLR) has hired Joe Burnett to the newly created position of director of Bitcoin strategy.
Alongside, the company which currently holds 4,449 bitcoin worth about $462 million anno… [+1582 chars]
